original_title: The Truth Behind Teen Dating "Boyfriends and Girlfriends"
overview: Should teens date? Do they understand the temptations involved in dating? Can they handle the emotions involved with dating? And how does haphazardous dating effect future marriages and relationships? These and many other questions have been debated between parents and teens for many years. Through this powerful video Elder G. Craige Lewis takes us on an in-depth and thought provoking journey through the natural and spiritual ramifications of teen dating. Designed to enlighten both adults and teens, this video shares facts and answers from the Word of God on the subject.
title: The Truth Behind Teen Dating "Boyfriends and Girlfriends"
